name: RASKY ON BEHALF OF FIRE EQUIPMENT MANUF. ASSN
description: Coordinates within the federal government to prepare for and respond to disasters
sampleDescriptions: Dept. of Defense (DOD) and General Services Administration (GSA) rules on fire safety equipment installation
Advocate for DOD and GSA buildings to improve fire safety in buildings they own and manage by bringing their building codes in line with model fire codes

DOD and GSA Rules in support of the installation of handheld fire extinguisher and other fire safety equipment
